name: Spatial Index Library
short_description: An extensible spatial index library in C++ that supports robust spatial indexing methods and many advanced features. Currently supports R-tree (Rtree, R*-tree) variants, Multi Version R-trees (MVR-tree) and TPR-trees. For more information please visit the project homepage.
